page.title: 06HOMES IN SPETISBURY.
page.content: Our cottage is about 2OO years old.It is built of cob which is a mixture of chalk,cow dung,straw and horse hair.Many cottages in Spetisbury have the same construction and some still have their thatched roofs.We have extended and modernised our cottage to make it more comfortable to live in.Many other people have also improved old houses ans many like us were not born in Spetisbury but come from other parts of the country.There are also new modern bungalows in Priory Gardens and Abbey View.My son's grandmother lives in one of these.Some are occupied by retired people like her but people with young families also live in them.
